entry.title: The Basics of a Neural Network Through the Eyes of a (Student) Mathematician

link.title: The Basics of a Neural Network Through the Eyes of a (Student) Mathematician

entry.content: Today, Iâ€™ll be trying to explain the very basics of a neural network, in a way that a high school calculus student with almost no computer science background would be able to understand it as: an optimization problem.
